title: Connection devices
fullText:
All plugs, socket-outlets and appliance couplers shall comply with AS/NZS 3112, AS/NZS 3123 or IEC 60309-2 as applicable and shall have an IP rating appropriate for the environment. Devices for interconnection of sub-mains shall be designed to prevent inadvertent disconnection under load.
NOTE: For further guidance on IP ratings refer to AS/NZS 3000.
